title: Participatory Language Education Program Design Through Co-Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in Designing Basic Language Education and Using Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Need for effective collaborative design processes in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can develop three or more language education scenarios using a collaborative design process
Learners can share and incorporate feedback on educational content prototypes at least twice with peers using LMS-based discussion tools
Learners can produce one or more learner-centered language activity materials applying participatory design principles

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
